text: I have spent months planning a project that was going to use webhooks in workflows and this is going to throw this off completely I now have to tell the client they have to buy yet another product to use a tiny amount of functionality

Hey All, sorry about the delay in responding, I wanted to send you a message before the weekend hits. We are taking the feedback in this thread here and passing it back internally. I should have more information for you next week on this. I didnâ€™t want to leave you hanging thinking we were ignoring you. We will be in touch.
